text: The Truth Seekers (Chinese: 真探) is a Singaporean drama television series. It is produced and shown on Mediacorp Channel 8. It began its run from 28 April 2016. There are 23 episodes. It stars Chen Hanwei, Rebecca Lim, Desmond Tan and Yusuke Fukuchi as the main characters. They play a team of cold case private investigators, who look into unsolved cases from years ago and break new ground with the help of scientific and technological advancements. During their investigations, members of the crime-busting team fall in – and out – of love as they learn other hidden truths about themselves and their comrades. ==Cast== *Chen Hanwei as Bai Qingxiong *Rebecca Lim as Huang Yuyang *Desmond Tan as Hong Junyan *Yusuke Fukuchi as Lan Haifeng *Lynn Poh as Yamamoto Atsuki ==Trivia== *Lynn Poh's 2016 drama after Your Hand In Mine. ==References== Category:Singaporean television programs Category:Chinese language Category:2010s television series Category:Drama television series
title: The Truth Seekers
